lead_paragraph: The Tennis Integrity Unit says French player Constant Lestienne has been banned for seven months for gambling on matches, with half of the sentence suspended.

headline.print_headline: French Tennis Player Banned 7 Months for Betting on Matches
headline.main: French Tennis Player Banned 7 Months for Betting on Matches
